intro.heading: Welcome to My Portfolio
intro.description: Hi, I'm Likhitha, a passionate web developer specializing in building efficient and scalable web applications. Explore my projects and learn more about what I do.

aboutSection.title: About Me
aboutSection.content: Hi, I'm Likhitha, a passionate web developer with years of experience in building efficient and scalable web applications. I specialize in front-end and back-end technologies, with a strong focus on delivering high-quality user experiences. Over the years, I have worked on a wide range of projects, from simple landing pages to complex applications used by thousands of users. I believe in the power of collaboration and continuous learning. Outside of coding, I enjoy exploring new technologies, reading tech blogs, and contributing to open-source projects. Let's build something amazing together!

items.title: Academic Achievements
content: Yakshagana artist during school and college level

items.title: Work Experiences
content: 1+ years of experience as a full-time employee at Embitel Technologies, Bangalore
